name: insert
description:
Inserts a substring in a string after a specified character
 position. If position = 0, prefixes the substring to the
 string.

params.name: String
params.description: A string, which to insert substring

params.name: position
params.description: Substring add after this position value in given string

examples.title: Simple insert function example
examples.description: To add substring on prefix of the given string

examples.title: Simple insert function example with position
examples.description: To add substring on suffix of the given string
